title: Planning Our Pregnancy
description:
In a flurry of wedding invites and pregnancy announcements, Lauren and Jeremy start planning the logistics of their future child.

Stay motivated while having fun with bike workouts, yoga, meditation, dance cardio and more. Visit https://onepeloton.com to learn more.
